description:
Ultralight running shorts with a simple design so you can stay focused on the path ahead. Breathable fabric keeps you cool during warm-weather workouts.

  • Made of lightweight polyester and spandex with 4-way stretch
  • Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: La Sportiva Sudden Shorts - Men's
